text: What If...? is an American computer-animated anthology series made for Disney+, based on the Marvel Comics series of the same name. It is the fourth television series in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) produced by Marvel Studios and the studio's first animated series from Marvel Studio Animation. It is set after the events of Loki and shows alternate timelines where the major events in the MCU movies have occurred differently. The series stars Jeffrey Wright as the Watcher, with many MCU movie actors reprising their roles. The series's first season premiered on August 11, 2021, and ran for nine episodes until October 6 as part of Phase Four of the MCU. The second season premiered on December 22, 2023, with its nine episodes released daily until December 30. The third season was released on December 22, 2024, with its eight episodes released daily until December 29. The second and the third seasons are part of Phase Five of the MCU. A Marvel Zombies series is in development. The Marvel Zombies series is based on one of the episodes in What If...? ==Synopsis== Following the establishment of the multiverse in the season one finale of Loki, What If...? explores various alternate timelines across the multiverse in which major moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movies occur differently, as observed by the Watcher. In the second season, following the formation of the Guardians of the Multiverse, the Watcher continues to explore more strange worlds, meeting new heroes and keeping the multiverse safe. ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2021)=== ===Season 2 (2023)=== ==References== Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:Disney+ original television series Category:2021 American television series debuts
title: What If...?
